It is under the administration of [[Xinzhou]] city. ==References== *[http://www.xzqh.org/html/index.html www.xzqh.org] {{zh icon}} {{County-level divisions of Shanxi}} {{coord|38|24|19|N|112|44|35|E|region:CN-14_type:adm2nd_source:kolossus-dewiki|display=title}} [[Category:County-level divisions of Shanxi]] [[Category:Xinzhou]] {{Shanxi-geo-stub}}
